alert.note: Alert for Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 03 at 4:52PM MST until December 04 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches in the Tetons and 2 to 5 inches in the Gros Ventres. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel over Teton Pass and Togwotee Pass will be impacted by the combination of snow and wind. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...After a lull this morning, snowfall rates will pick up by mid-afternoon. For forecast snowfall images and avalanche weather information, go to weather.gov/riverton/avalancheweather.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
